title: Math
description: Math is a puzzle; every problem you solve is a step closer to seeing the world clearly. Struggle is proof you’re growing—keep going.

title: Physics
description: Physics is the language of the universe—every law you learn is like unlocking a secret of reality.

title: Biology
description: Biology is the story of life—every cell, every gene, every breath is a chapter waiting to be understood.

title: Chemistry
description: Chemistry is the magic of the universe explained — where tiny atoms create endless possibilities.
